abstract: Reassessing the role of mammograms, a limited expansion of a mortgage program, how iPads affect hotel Internet systems and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: Reassessing the role of mammograms, a limited expansion of a mortgage program, how iPads affect hotel Internet systems and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Tuesday Reading: Reassessing the Role of Mammograms
